enWisdom: Obedience is the most protective of accoutrements
Obedience is the most protective (or most reliable) safeguard
Obedience to Allah is the strongest means [of attaining success in both worlds]
By [their] virtuous obedience, the righteous ones are known
Achievement of goodness is through maintaining obedience

Wisdom: طَاعَةُ اللَّهِ مِفْتَاحُ كُلِّ سَدَادٍ وَصَلَاحُ كُلِّ فَسَادٍ [وَ مَعَادٍ]
enWisdom: Obedience to Allah is the key to [every] right action and the rectification of [every] corruption (or of the Hereafter)

Wisdom: طَاعَةُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ أَعْلَى عِمَادٍ وَأَقْوَى عَتَادٍ
enWisdom: Obedience to Allah, the Glorified, is the highest pillar and the strongest accoutrement
Espousing obedience [to Allah] is the best accoutrement [for the Hereafter]
How good a means [of attainting closeness to Allah] obedience is!

Wisdom: الْحُظْوَةُ عِنْدَ الْخَالِقِ بِالرَّغْبَةِ فِيمَا لَدَيْهِ الْحُظْوَةُ عِنْدَ الْمَخْلُوقِ بِالرَّغْبَةِ عَمَّا فِي يَدَيْهِ
enWisdom: Favour is gained in the sight of the Creator by yearning for that which is with Him; favour is gained with the creatures by turning away from what they possess
Obedience extinguishes the anger of the Lord
The pleasure of Allah, the Glorified, is linked to His obedience

Wisdom: مَنْ عَمِلَ بِطَاعَةِ اللَّهِ كَانَ مَرْضِيّاً
enWisdom: One who acts in obedience to Allah, he is well pleased with [by Allah]

Wisdom: مَنْ بَادَرَ إِلَى مَرَاضِي اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ وَتَأَخَّرَ عَنْ مَعَاصِيهِ فَقَدْ أَكْمَلَ الطَّاعَةَ
enWisdom: One who hastens towards the actions that please Allah, the Glorified, and delays acts of disobedience to Him has indeed perfected [his] obedience
Whoever obeys Allah, He chooses him [to be among those who are close to Him]
Obedience [to Allah] is a profitable trade
The action done in obedience to Allah is more profitable

Wisdom: الطَّاعَةُ وَفِعْلُ الْبِرِّ هُمَا الْمَتْجَرُ الرَّابِحُ
enWisdom: Obedience and virtuous actions are the two profitable trades

Wisdom: الْعَمَلُ بِطَاعَةِ اللَّهِ أَرْبَحُ وَلِسَانُ الصِّدْقِ أَزْيَنُ وَأَنْجَحُ
enWisdom: Action in obedience to Allah is more beneficial, and being truthful is more beautiful and [makes one more] successful
bey [Allah] and you will benefit
Obey [Allah] and you will gain

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِنْ رَغِبْتُمْ إِلَى اللَّهِ غَنِمْتُمْ وَنَجَوْتُمْ وَإِنْ رَغِبْتُمْ إِلَى الدُّنْيَا خَسِرْتُمْ وَهَلَكْتُمْ
enWisdom: Indeed if you desire [closeness to] Allah, you will become prosperous and will be saved, whereas if you desire the [attainment of this] world, you will be at a loss and will be destroyed
Do business with Allah and you will profit
In obedience [to Allah] there are treasures of benefit
One who obeys his Lord gains authority
One who acts in obedience to Allah gains [prosperity]

Wisdom: مَنِ اتَّخَذَ طَاعَةَ اللَّهِ بِضَاعَةً [صِنَاعَةً] أَتَتْهُ الْأَرْبَاحُ مِنْ غَيْرِ تِجَارَةٍ
enWisdom: Whoever takes the obedience of Allah as his merchandise, profits come to him without any trade

Wisdom: مَنْ عَمِلَ بِطَاعَةِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ لَمْ يَفُتْهُ غُنْمٌ وَلَمْ يَغْلِبْهُ خَصْمٌ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: لَا تَعَرَّضْ لِمَعَاصِي اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ وَاعْمَلْ بِطَاعَتِهِ يَكُنْ لَكَ ذُخْراً
enWisdom: Never belittle the small sins, for they are indeed dangerous [and destructive]; and one who is surrounded by his belittled [sins] is destroyed by them
